<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v2/app_clients"}

>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve a list of application clients configured for the customer account.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}

</Heading>
